message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product at a competitive price of $16,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is truly higher than that. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
